story.dialogue: The group gathers in a dimly lit room, maps and notes scattered across the table.
I think we should discuss our plan before moving forward.
That sounds great! I'm really excited about this!
Frustration builds as the group's progress stalls.
This is ridiculous! We’ve been going in circles for hours!
I just don’t know if I can do this anymore... it’s too much.
A distant rustling sound pierces the silence, sending a chill down their spines.
Wait... did you hear that? Something is out there!
Let’s stay calm and figure this out logically.
Relief washes over Jake as he finally sees a way forward.
Haha! See? I told you we'd make it through!
Wait... you mean we were right all along?!
A foul stench lingers in the air, making Alex recoil in discomfort.
Ugh, what is that smell? This place is awful!
A creeping sense of unease settles over the group as Emma's instincts scream danger.
I don't like this... I have a really bad feeling about this...
